description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 26  May 2020 (RN: 19/08749/FULL) for the: Excavation to lower level of lower ground floor and extension under front garden and creation of rear lightwell and alterations to front lightwell. Demolition of closet wing and erection of full width infill at ground floor level and two storey extension at ground and first floor levels. Erection of mansard roof extension. Raise level of rear garden and alterations to boundaries. Alterations to windows and doors. NAMELY, to allow the introduction of new low profile Velux roof window, living green flat roof to new rear extension, external wall to new pitched roof extension to be constructed in brickwork, black painted band to glazed pitched roof, glazing to oversail new rear wall, glazed double doors to new rear extension, Crittall style double doors in place of approved window and door to rear lower ground floor, excavation of rear garden to full width and length; to new floor level of previously approved lightwell and new retaining walls; vertical living green wall to rear sunken garden and new planters and built in bench seat in place of approved new trees; installation of Air conditioning unit in rear lowered garden within slatted timber housing; new raised planter arrangement to front garden, with electric car charging point to side; curved railings over front lightwell; new window to new utility room and replacement window to existing opening in the new kitchen at lower ground floor; lowering of front lightwell floor by 130mm; rear elevation to be retained as per existing; internal arrangements; and  restoring of external finishes, door and window surrounds, railing and other features to front elevation.
